ygData.subject: Re: GZ Letter was Pixie Strike broken
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Been busy at work, haven t sent a letter.  Wasn t even able to find GZ s email address for that matter. ... -- John H. Kim kim@stormhaven.org
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 18 Oct 1999, Daniel P. Sniderman wrote:
>
> Did you get ANY sort of response from GZ regarding your letter?

Been busy at work, haven't sent a letter. Wasn't even able to
find GZ's email address for that matter.

> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <kim@...>
> To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Monday, October 18, 1999 2:43 PM
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Pixie Strike broken (was Charm)
>
>
> > It was not in the letter. I've been /bugging it. Now that
> > I'm hitting the upper level limit for charm, I'm getting more
> > annoyed by it and will probably fire off an email to GZ asking
> > about it at some point.
--
John H. Kim
kim@...
